alert.note: Alert for Eastern Uinta Basin (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 19 at 7:38PM MST until February 22 at 11:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches with locally higher amounts possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...In Colorado, Lower Yampa River Basin and Central Yampa River Basin. In Utah, Eastern Uinta Basin. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions with patchy blowing snow significantly reducing visibility at times...especially in open areas. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
